channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:48 Air alert in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:48 Air alert in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Запоризька_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
